Service Details: - Monitors and enforces the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act (public sector) and the Personal Information Protection Act (private sector)- Monitors how public bodies respond to requests for access to information and how they protect the privacy of personal information- Reviews may be requested by writing to the Commissioner's Office within 30 days of receiving a public body's written decision about releasing records
